actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: The demon vomits in a 15-foot cube. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw or take 11 (2d10) acid damage and fall prone in the spew.
actions.name: Disgorge (Recharge 6)
